name: politico
text:
Florida Republican Gov. Ron DeSantis outlined an aggressive plan to crackdown on what he calls “violent agitators”, amplifying Florida’s role in a polarizing national fight Trump and other Republicans are waging against Biden and Democrats
https://t.co/HBldX6FlOs

name: politico
text: Just a handful of states could decide who becomes the next president. On today's POLITICO Dispatch, our reporters from across the country break down what it will take for Donald Trump and Joe Biden to win over the most critical voters. https://t.co/lapWit4NIe
